title: Cali and Wanda Lou
description: Cali and Wanda Lou is a story about a girl and her stuffed calico cat. Told from the perspective of Cali, the cat, the two take adventurous trips to many faraway places, such as Tokyo, Beijing, and Bangkok. Students will enjoy learning about the many interesting sites Cali and Wanda Lou visit on their trip. Photographs and illustrations support the text.
meta: foreigners, kimono, klong, moat, mosaics, obi, pagoda, passport, sawatdi, sayonara, spires, sushi, tempura, tuk-tuk, venom, zai jian
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compound Sentences : Identify compound sentences used in the text
Suffixes : Understand the use of words with suffix -ful

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
